entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5Â°C

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing this morning. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow this evening. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
